Company Overview.Name: Prithvi Exchange (India) Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Reserve Bank of India licensed, Authorized Dealer Category II. Provides foreign exchange services to leisure and business travelers, students, corporates (IT, manufacturing, service), and individuals traveling abroad.  Has tie-ups with various banks and travel agencies.
